divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were sitting in the backyard talking.i happened to look toward the north and noticed what appeared to be a very bright starlike object.i pointed it out to my wife.i happened to have my canon s5 camera with me and snapped a few shots of the object.through the cameras viewfinder when zoomed in the object appeared to be a triangle shape with three points of light one in front and two in back.but the pictures show a totally differnt object.i will send the pics so you can analyze.you will have to zoom on them to see the object
